modal.title: Add Sales Channel
modal.messageNoProductStreams: In order to use product comparisons a dynamic product group has to be created first.

detail.messageSaveError: The Sales Channel "{name}" could not be saved. Please check your entries.
detail.messageActivateWithoutThemeError: The Sales Channel "{name}" could not yet activated. Activated Sales Channels need to have a theme associated.
detail.activateDisable: Please save the Sales Channel and assign a theme to it before activating.
detail.messageAPIError: Unable to generate API access key.
detail.textDeleteInfo: Careful, you are about to delete this Sales Channel permanently! If you proceed, the Sales Channel and all its settings will no longer be available. However, deleting the Sales Channel will not affect existing orders and categories.
detail.textConfirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this Sales Channel?
detail.textConfirmDeleteDomain: Are you sure you want to delete this domain? The Sales Channel will no longer be accessible by "{url}"
detail.navigationCategoryHelpText: For this entry point, you can not select categories of the type "customizable link" or "structuring element".
detail.textDeleteSalesChannelWarning: Removing this Sales Channel cannot be undone.
detail.textDomainDescription: Each selected language must have it's own domain in order to work in your online Sales Channel. You can also add custom domains here.
detail.textApiAccessDescription: In order to get API access, you need the API key shown below. Generating the key anew will overwrite the old key and by that terminate all existing access routes that were set up with it. This action cannot be undone.
detail.textActiveDescription: Switching off a Sales Channel will make it inaccessible to visitors and API connections.
detail.maintenanceModeDescription: Maintenance mode sets the Sales Channel invisible to visitors. However white listed/labelled IPs may still access it. This way you can safely work on the sales channel data, while blocking out visitors with a maintenance mode screen.
detail.ipAddressWhitleListHelpText: Add IP-addresses to the white list in order to allow selective access to your shop. You may add IPv4- and IPv6-addresses as needed.

productComparison.notYetGenerated: This export has not been generated yet.

storefrontDomainLanguage.label: Language
storefrontDomainLanguage.help: Automatically selected from sales channel domain

productComparison.messageAccessKeyChanged: The access key and the changed export URL are only active after saving the sales channel.

templates.label: Template
templates.modal-message: When you apply the template, existing data in this sales channel will be overwritten. Both the settings and the template tabs will be adjusted.

message.template-applied-message: The data from the template has been applied. Please save the sales channel to save the changes.

sw-sales-channel-defaults-select.messageError: The value is in use by domain: "%{url}".
